@@ -1836,2 +1836,1 @@ - * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code count} is less than zero - * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the result overflows the buffer + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code count} is negative @@ -1841,1 +1840,1 @@ - throw new IllegalArgumentException("count is less than zero: " + count); + throw new IllegalArgumentException("count is negative: " + count); @@ -1871,0 +1870,3 @@ + *

+ * If {@code cs} is {@code null}, then the four characters + * {@code "null"} are repeated into this sequence. @@ -1878,2 +1880,1 @@ - * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code count} is less than zero - * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the result overflows the buffer + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code count} is negative @@ -1883,1 +1884,1 @@ - throw new IllegalArgumentException("count is less than zero: " + count); + throw new IllegalArgumentException("count is negative: " + count);
